Description:
The job details provided give a comprehensive overview of the company, its services, and the requirements for the Sales Engineer position. Here's a review of the job details:Company Description:The company, specializes in the maintenance and installation of steam and water systems.
They have particular expertise in steam boilers and washing machines.
They maintain an extensive inventory of spare parts, including various steam and water system components.
They offer a comprehensive suite of boiler maintenance services, including chemical cleaning and calibration.
The company also has a construction division.Job Description:The company is looking to hire a Sales Engineer with expertise in steam systems and boiler maintenance.
The Sales Engineer will have a pivotal role in boosting sales growth.
Responsibilities include visiting projects for evaluation and expansion, marketing products and services, and traveling to project sites in Saudi Arabia.Job Features:The company provides accommodation and a daily food allowance.
Sales Engineers can earn a commission of 1-2% on sales.
Travel allowances are provided.
There's 30 days of paid vacation, health insurance, and an annual airline ticket allowance.
Half of the salary is paid annually.Skills
Skills:
Candidates should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in the steam industry, specifically in steam boiler maintenance and accessories.
Proven sales skills and a results-driven approach are essential.
A valid driver's license and the ability to drive a car are required.

The job details are well-structured, providing a clear understanding of the company's focus, the role of the Sales Engineer, and the benefits and requirements associated with the position. It effectively communicates the company's specialization and the importance of the Sales Engineer's role in driving sales growth. Additionally, the inclusion of accommodation, allowances, and benefits makes the position appealing.
